subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Tyler Hansbrough finished with 28 points and 13 rebounds, including 20 points in the second half, as North Carolina defeated Louisville, 83-73, to reach the Final Four.
